content:
# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Korean

# Target Fragment
faint melody

# Target Sentence
A faint melody drifted from the open window

# Context
Night markets were closing. <sentence>A <fragment>faint melody</fragment> drifted from the open window</sentence> Streetlights flickered in the alley below.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Korean

# Target Fragment
steady footsteps

# Target Sentence
Only the steady footsteps echoed in the hallway

# Context
Most employees had left. <sentence>Only the <fragment>steady footsteps</fragment> echoed in the hallway</sentence> The fluorescent lights buzzed overhead.

# Source Language
English

# Target Language
Korean

# Target Fragment
fresh tracks

# Target Sentence
We found fresh tracks leading toward the creek

# Context
Snow had fallen overnight. <sentence>We found <fragment>fresh tracks</fragment> leading toward the creek</sentence> The forest was silent except for our breath.
{"translation":"갓 남은 흔적","sentence_translation":"우리는 개울을 향해 이어지는 갓 남은 흔적을 발견했다"}
